website_summaries.verdict: This extendable ice scraper makes it easy to clean off every bit of your car. Three different scraping surfaces make it great for all types of snow and sleet.
pros: Lots of happy customers who have owned over several winters
Brush pivots to get into hard-to-reach spots
cons: A few owners don't like the swivel because it moves when they don't want it to

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! I get my car cleaned off in no time and can even do my roof now. The scraper even gets my windshield done faster than my old typical scraper did. Worth paying for. Love that it collapses and had different angle options. ***UPDATE*** First big storm where I desperately needed the snow pusher side it broke off only a quarter of the way through cleaning my car off. Given the price I would expect it to make it through at least one winter!
customer_reviews.author: Kg

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the fifth use. The little lever that allows you to lock the extension in place broke.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dion

customer_reviews.title: only good for light snow.  broken after first heavy snowfall
customer_reviews.text: broken hinge after first heavy snowfall. entire foam plow side broke off. does a nice job of pushing/pulling piles of snow off but if it gets caught up on ice, forget it. the buttons are not spring loaded and they are in poor locations. you can accidentally hit them and the bar will extend or collapse on you. the foam plow has a memory which leaves streaks in your windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Thought these were going to be great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for my family. First on out of the box, pushed the button to change the head angle. On the second push, the button and spring went flying. Cheap plastic from China. Engineers always want to put square internal corners because they look pretty. I ran a molding department for many years, and this never works because it is a weak stress point. A small radius works a lot better!!!! Now they want me to return it before I can get a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bought It

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, it's an attractive product. However, it's too complex and not long enough. Unlike other products, where a replacement pole can be screwed into the head, this is an all-in-one unit with a highly-specific part on both ends. Everything "clicks" together with spring-loaded parts. And, the extending pole does not extend far enough to be anything really special. Finally, one end of the unit is an ice-scraper. So, if you need to hang onto the end, to gain the extra reach, you'll be hanging onto the blade of the plastic scraper. That being said, the unit is an acceptable quality to make it through a winter or two.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Huge snow broom.  Probably better for a large truck than a car or SUV.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to return this after receiving it and placing it in my car. While it is well made and effective at snow removal, it is absolutely huge. It's almost like having another passenger in the car! I drive a mid-sized SUV (Kia Sorento), and this is too large to lay across the floor. It has to either go in the trunk (inconvenient), or stand vertically in my vehicle. As for the effectiveness as a snow broom, it is very good. The only thing I'd change is to put the ice scraper on the same side as the broom so you don't have to flip it around when switching between pushing snow and scraping ice. The foam grips are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: student_cs

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I currently cannot give a completely honest review as the worst of Ohio winter is over (maybe), but I did get to use it once. The brush does require some small assembly, but it's very easy. It's easy to operate and works like a charm. It is pretty massive, even in it's condensed state, so be prepared for that. While it is designed for trucks and SUVs, it's just fine for a car. I can't wait until next Winter to see how it handles more snow. I did not get to use the ice breaker, but did use the standard scraper and it works nicely. The brush is sturdy and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Ready to MOOve some snow!
customer_reviews.text: The snow moover is well-made with quality parts and a solid design. The orange foam pusher is substantial yet soft enough that I trust it will not scratch my brand new 2018 jeep. The process for extending the handle is easy and foolproof. I am very satisfied. I purchased the "Deluxe Extendable Snow MOOver" (many of the reviews for this item are combined with other models so you need to be aware of just which one you are buying.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Logger

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have a garage, this will be your best snowy winter friend.
customer_reviews.text: The extendable handle on this makes cleaning off my SUV so easy that I wish I would have found this thing years ago. I no longer get soaking wet leaning over the hood to scrape ice from the windshield or clear it from snow. I bought one for my parents for Christmas because I found it so useful. One thing to note though is that this thing is fairly long. I don't keep it in my vehicle and save a small scraper for travels because the Snow MOOver takes up a good amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: On A Journey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have 19" wheels on our CX5 so we ordered a longer one for me and it is perfect to push or pull the snow all the way across the car for a 5'4" person like I am. I just did not see the longer on when I ordered it last time. We had ordered & used the shorter one all last winter & it has been a strong & sturdy product & does not scratch. We will still use that one for our "less tall" car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only scraper anyone should have.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scrapper for two winters, best one I have bought. Customer service is excellent. Does not scratch. I can reach whole car without walking around. Best part is people are talking about it. Old review- "So far so good, will test more as snow falls. Had some snow this past week and tried it out and have to say it was nice. I was reluctant at first since it looks smaller online. But it was pretty easy clearing snow off whole car. Also arrived a day early.”
customer_reviews.author: Jake Allen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. Extends to the other side of the vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ford Super Duty that stands about 8ft tall, and since it lives outside all of its life, it gets covered in snow in the winter. I purchased this broom/scraper to see if it was easier to stand on the ground instead of on the floor of the truck and leaning across the windshield. I can get the whole windshield from ground level now! And use the broom end to clear off the snow from the hood, Gotta stretch a little to get the roof, and the tonneau cover. Great product so far!
customer_reviews.author: jmascioni

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast in the best way possible!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase! I had originally bought another brand with a similar design and was disappointed. I’m in Minnesota and have 2 SUV’s and am only 5’4 so I needed something with a long handle that was super heavy and this checks those boxes. Even held up to some seriously heavy wet snow. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Johnna

customer_reviews.title: If you live in a snow area, you need these
customer_reviews.text: Used the snow mover about 2 days after receiving when we got hit with 3" of snow. The snow mover does a much better job that the bristle brushes and with less effort. I like the extension length too. We have one for my car and one for my wifes. Too bad though, that it wasn't available in blue or red for our case. But the color, regardless has no real bearing on how these snow movers work to clean the car fast and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Borack

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: This product broke only after a few uses. I live in the North East when it gets cold in the winter. Plastic gets brittle when it gets cold. The plastic connecting the pusher to than handle is thin. It doesn't mush force to snap it. Another problem is that there is no easy way to replace the handle where it broke off, unlike other products available. With other products you can unscrew the handle and replace it with pretty much any other handle you have lying around like a broom handle that unscrews.
customer_reviews.author: Ech0

customer_reviews.title: Big sturdy snow mover.
customer_reviews.text: Having to take snow off of two full sized pickup trucks and two minivans can be a challenge with most smaller brushes. Not to mention this thing hasn't scratched my finish like a brush. I recently used the ice scraper end and it worked like a champ. They fold down to minimize space when not using. I purchased two for my own use and really like them. Will buy more for gifts next winter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hackenburg

customer_reviews.title: The aluminum shaft will bend, and then it will break!!!
customer_reviews.text: The damn thing just bent and broke while trying to get the snow off my truck!!! I just bought it last year, and it's barely been used!!! If you live in a northern state that gets real snow and ice, THIS IS NOT FOR YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Makes snow removal so much easier
customer_reviews.text: Makes snow removal so much easier especially since I'm short and I have to occasionally scrape a Ram truck. I usually use this for my sedan and love it because I can be done scraping snow off really fast without worrying about the paint job. I saw this being used at a new car lot and now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: Gitchiegaya

customer_reviews.title: Good but plastic needs improvement in cold conditions
customer_reviews.text: Works great until the scraper broke after half of the mn winter. The plastic becomes brittle in the cold and the adjustment button snaped
customer_reviews.author: shelby crossman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy; easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was able to clean off my car after a big snow in less than half the time it had taken in the past (using a broom or a flimsy “snow brush”), and clean it much better. The material on the “pusher” end is nice and soft, protecting your car’s paint job. The head can pivot and lock at multiple angles. It’s lightweight so your arms won’t get too tired holding it up while pushing lots of snow off the roof of your car.
customer_reviews.author: JP Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a “beast” for snow removal! It works so easily to clean my SUV and reach to the roof of it to pull the snow off with the soft foam part. Easy to flip to opposite side to use the scraper. It is also easy to extend the tool and make it shorter again. I remove snow from my car more quickly than I have in past when I’ve used less expensive snow removal tools.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone who deals with large snow storms.
customer_reviews.text: Quality snow broom right here. The foam end is made of a strong material and looks like it will last a while. The handle has comfortable grips and the perfect amount of extension. The removable ice scraper is a nice touch. This product is perfect for after a snow storm and you have to take 2 feet of snow off your truck. The end folds in for easy storage in any trunk/toolbox. I can reach every inch of my GMC K2500.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Phillip Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Broke second season
customer_reviews.text: The first season with this tool, I was in love. It worked as advertised. This season, the ratcheting gear that allows the head to swivel just snapped in half, rendering it completely useless. I'd buy it again if they fabricated the parts out of something stronger than cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Diemetric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made sturdy product. Love that it has adjustable lengths and can be compact for storage compared to long fixed snow brushes. Also like that the foam head has a push button to fold it in lengthwise against the pole for easier storage. It has nice foam grips which are very comfortable and has a good ice scraper. At full extension I can easily clear snow off the top of my Toyota 4Runner (I'm 5'7" tall) Hope that all helps, I would definitely recommend this product and it would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: SHLEE

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is top notch. During the winter months I keep it in the back seat. It really makes quick work of snow removal. You dont get it all over you because the telescoping pole allows you to stand back and theh scraper annihilates ice layers. I love the foam edges you dont have to worry about damaging your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Finson

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one season
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. Being able to swivel the head comes in handy when cleaning off the roof of my Outback. Sadly, I was cleaning off my car, maybe 2" of light fluffy snow, and I heard a snap. Now the two pieces do not stay together and I wasted $33.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: will not hold up to heavy snow
customer_reviews.text: In no time I noticed the metal was way too light and was bent, Tried to move heavy {not wet} snow and it broke, take a look at how thin metal is! Too bad we purchased two at the time thinking a second one would be good to have expecting it to be better quality. We noticed how exceptionally light they where when they arrived in a box, like the box was empty. I think the pic speaks for itself, I will say the rest of it works well, I would recommend removing the scraper end when not needed, its very sharp and will easily tear clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Fans in Chicagoland!
customer_reviews.text: Moved to Chicagoland area and WAS NOT prepared for the snow. Once I purchased this beast of a tool... NO ISSUES! Love this thing! I even bought my husband one! After he saw it in action his little scraper/brush didn’t even compare! We are big fans!
customer_reviews.author: Travelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great, 1 broke early, but it was replaced for free!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, but the second time I was using it after purchase the extending pole came out of the housing (the stopper came out and is stuck inside the main shaft) and I could not get the extender back inside. UPDATE: However, I did reach out to the manufacturer and they responded immediately and sent a replacement that's holding up much better!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Jordan

customer_reviews.title: 55” snow MOOver
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is the ice scraper is not big enough for me but again I am lazy. I would like the scraper to have been wider so I can clean more of my windshield at one time. I like the snow blade is wide enough, soft enough and long enough for my truck. Soft enough where it won’t scratch, long enough for a 2016 ram 1500 to remove all snow.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mulcahey

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy snow
customer_reviews.text: This does not substitute for the good old brush when needing to get snow out of the nooks and crannies (front hood vents, door tracks, etc). The Mover is fantastic for clearing large quantities of heavy or light snow in just a single pass. We have a van, and with the extension I can move all the snow off in a single pass. The most I've had to use it on so far is only about 6 inches and it preformed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Pivot button fell apart after 4  uses.
customer_reviews.text: The pivot button fell apart after using it 4 times making the Snowmoover useless as a snow brush. Was really nice to use prior to that, and worked well to push the snow off my Ram 1500 and Jeep Grand Cherokee. Unfortunately the company does not sell just the pivot button so I will need to buy another one. I will be looking for something more reliable I guess. After I wrote this, I started reading other reviews and noticed that there are a lot of them that complain about this button breaking. So, I would hope Bridrock would know of this design defect and would be doing something about it.
customer_reviews.author: lutefisk69

customer_reviews.title: Wow... Love this Snow Brush!
customer_reviews.text: The BIRDROCK HOME Snow Brush is a home run! Living in upstate NY we see heavy snows on a regular basis during the winter and a regular snow brush you get at your local auto parts store doesn't cut it. The BIRDROCK HOME Snow brush is adjustable in length and the brush head can collapse left or right for storage. Buy It!
customer_reviews.author: hurley2323

customer_reviews.title: Okay while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I'll give this snow brush credit for having a very beefy aluminum pole, and that the scraper end does technically detach so you can use it separately, though that doesn't seem to be particularly worth it. However, the plastics in the swivel joint do not match the beefed up quality of the pole, the least important part in my opinion. They cracked after a couple of months of use rendering the whole thing junk at that point. I ordered a replacement of a different type from another vendor which I had used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Partycat

customer_reviews.title: Ready to tackle New England snow
customer_reviews.text: It was always a challenge to get snow off the top of my SUV, so when my old scraper broke I searched for a better one. The excellent reviews of the “Deluxe Extendable Snow MOOver" are fully justified. It is sturdy and well built, has an adjustable head and extends easily to get snow off the roof, yet fits nicely in my cargo area. As soon as my engineer husband inspected it, he asked me to order one for his car as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gal

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS SCRAPER IT IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I really lie how easy it can be reduced in size or tucked together for when I am not using it. The scraper end is heavy duty. I doesn't chip when scraping icy windshield. Foam scraper does great job getting snow off of hood, and I really like that I can extend longer for getting snow off of the roof of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: PAZ

customer_reviews.title: Will need a REAL snow remover when this breaks!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. The extension broke first. My son fixed it by drilling holes and screws into the aluminum. But now the plastic has snapped right behind the brush. I tried to reinforce ot with my glue gun and tons of strong tape, but it snapped again. It should never have been dedigned with flimsy plastic in a strategic spot that instead needs extra strength and reinforcement. Really disappointed since I was using this for what it is designed for. I need a reliable snow removal device. This is NOT reliable. Now my xterra is covered with snow and a broom doesn't work. Piece of JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works great but plastic becomes brittle in the cold
customer_reviews.text: The first snow storm was a breeze cleaning off our vehicles. Unfortunately, cleaning off about 4 inches of snow of the top of our mini van and the plastic ring that controls the angle of the foam brush broke. I think it had more to do with the temperature being -16 than the weight of the snow but I was disappointed in the lack of strength of the plastic. Now I have a very expensive ice scrapper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked so well until it broke
customer_reviews.text: It worked so well for clearing snow off my truck. We had a few snows since Feb when I got it - had no issue with 14" of snow. Then on 4th use - small 6" (was a bit cold 14F) it just snapped. Very sad - I like this product it just needs to last. I am returning this one and will buy one in Oct to see if it lasts a whole season
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this item. Worked well for the first few dustings of snow but when trying to clear my Expedition of a couple inches of snow, a few things happened : 1) the plow would keep swiveling on its own making it virtually impossible to use 2) slow for stuck under the extending button causing it to slide back and forth 3) the brush/plow head broke off on the third use. I'm guessing it was fun the weight of trying to move 3 inches of wet heavy snow. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: B Lipschutz

customer_reviews.title: Every company doesn’t want to put out the best overall product!
customer_reviews.text: It is too bad that no company wants to put out the best all around product for snow and ice removal in one product. This scraper is horrible for so many reasons. This design has never been any good and if by chance it works. You stand to wack the hell Out of your vehicle. So it’s my guess is that no one company wants to do right by the customers!
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: It would be more practical with a brush on one side
customer_reviews.text: It's a well-constructed item. There's no brush on it though. We found out that a brush does have good purpose. Brushs are far better at reaching down in the cowling underneath the windshield wipers and other tight spots. I'll know next time...
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it broke (not even 1 winter)
customer_reviews.text: It was working great but broke before finishing one winter. It’s been about an average amount of snow this year around Boston,ma. I was was pushing and pulling it across the roof of my car and the snow blade snapped off at a point with 2 thin plastic points. Maybe mine was defective, couldn’t say; other people certainly like it & I would have given it 5 stars at the end of the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cleay

customer_reviews.title: Good for New England winter
customer_reviews.text: I live in New England and am short so a nice long brush that can get the snow on top of my car is key. This guy does the job. Sturdy, easy to use and pushes the snow right off. Life changer.
customer_reviews.author: Stone2008

customer_reviews.title: High quality tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and sturdy tool. I like that the foam brush folds back in line with the handle to make storage easier. I also like that extending the handle has spring loaded pins that lock into place so that the handle can't collapse when you push snow. Having a scraper on one end was an unexpected nicety. It's so nice I caught my wife going out to use it. This tool will be usable for years. Money well spent!!!
customer_reviews.author: F. C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Throw out those obsolete brushes and get this!
customer_reviews.text: This. Is. Great. I live in the New England and get a good amount of snow. I have a dodge magnum and I can reach the entire top from one side. It also pulls off all of the snow unlike the brushes that will have clumps packed on certain spots. This is a great investment if you deal with snowy seasons!
customer_reviews.author: Will C

customer_reviews.title: Great at first- breaks after a few months
customer_reviews.text: For the past three years I bought one of these. Each year it breaks. Something gets messed up with it. Won’t be buying for a 4th year. Works great for a few months then breaks and becomes trash.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect much more than the standard snow scraper but the extension and pusher make quite a difference. The ability to push heavy snowfall off in one motion without having go to each side of the car is worth the price and is very convenient. A little more bulky than traditional snow brush/scraper but benefits outweigh the downside.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for me to use as a 5ft person clearing off a 1500 truck. Still wish it had a brush for the small spots like by the windshield wipers and the mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Leah D

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought these and loved them so much, that we bought them as Christmas gifts for our family. I had an issue with shipping and the seller cleared everything up & was extremely professional! Can’t wait for Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awkward and cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Awkward and cumbersome. The foam heads do not do a good job of getting snow off of a normal sized car. It is difficult if not impossible to get into someone tighter spaces. I think this maybe a good purchase if you have a large truck or other large vehicle but for an everyday sized car you're better off going the bristle brush route.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Held up through a PA winter.
customer_reviews.text: Held up just fine through a PA winter. I knew it's limits and didn't try to push it too hard. Moved the snow effortlessly and foam was easy on paint. Scraper did its job but feels a little delicate but worked when needed.
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Rugged and worked well this winter! First thing you should do when you get this is spray Silicone on the adjustable aluminum shaft. Handle came stuck together sprayed it and tapped the pusher end a few times with a rubber mallet! Worked the handle in and out a couple of times and it has been working fine all this past winter! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hydrants56

customer_reviews.title: Fastest snow removal
customer_reviews.text: We had a few snowfalls with over a foot of snow accumulated and this brush pushed all of it off my car in just a few strokes. Far less work that previous brushes used and the ice scraper worked well also. The long length really helped to get those areas that you would have to bend over and really stretch to reach. Hope it will last a few seasons but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: BGMD

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and clears snow as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This snow brush performs as described. The extended reach and the head folding down to be in parallel with the handle for easier storage are the features that really stand out. The material for the head of the sweeper is a great no mar material that car salesmen use on their lots. Definitely recommend, especially for SUV's and mini vans that need the extra reach.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: So I’m not upset with this product and it does what it’s supposed to but it is rather bulky and isn’t the greatest for maneuvering around mirrors and similar areas. I’m also not a big fan of the “plow” design and would have preferred the body with a brush not this. The ice scraper is also on the small side although it does work well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1st heavy snow swivel head broke making it useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in November and I really liked it. But we’ve had a relatively mild winter, as far as snow is concerned, till last night. It was wet heavy snow and when pushing it off my windshield this morning the joint that makes the head rotate just snapped into pieces. Bummed, cause otherwise I liked it, but I guess they’re pretty cheap and too expensive to buy a new one every winter.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Grill

customer_reviews.title: More to follow
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but I can say appearance is VERY STURDY AND BEEFY. Bit bigger than you would expect, but if it works as well as it appears , this will be nice to have. I gave it 4 stars because it looks like it will do the job nicely and hold up over time. I will admit this as I need to.
customer_reviews.author: darkskies

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: Just moved from SoCal to upstate NY, still getting used to snow but this has been very helpful with ice and snow removal. We haven’t had much snow yet, just a couple inches every so often. So far it does a great job with scraping ice and removing snow. I will update when we have a massive snow storm.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Broke on me
customer_reviews.text: My snow moover broke on its hinge on a snowy day last winter after only 1 winter of use. I purchased a second only due to the fact that it seems quality and i hope this was a fluke.... But i cant recommend this till I get through another winter with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: On my top three list of snow tools
customer_reviews.text: This thing works GREAT. One side is curved to push, the other to pull. I'm in Vermont and have an XTerra and no garage, so there's lots of snow clearing on the car. If it doesn't last, as some other reviews indicate, I'll buy a new one every winter.
customer_reviews.author: Reina Pennington

customer_reviews.title: It WILL break.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding tool until the adjusting button flies apart leaving you with a fancy, telescoping stick. There's no real need for an adjustable head unless you want to organize and separate the snow into neat piles before throwing it onto the ground. It's over-complicated and predictably, it breaks at the most complicated point. Keep It Simple Stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Stan A. Shimkus

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing to clear the snow off my SUV
customer_reviews.text: So well made that I show it off to others struggling to reach the snow on their vehicles. Best one I've ever used or seen. It was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Removes snow fast on larger vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on our minivan in a region that receives over 200" snowfall annually. It is rather bulky compared to competitors (I prefer a traditional compact brush for my small car), but is more comfortable and durable. It moves snow fast.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Big and works great, just no brush
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and easy, I live in Chicago, I use it often, the extension and the folding top make it somewhat compacts for how big it is, only downfall is it doesn’t have a brush to get in smaller areas like your windshield wipers
customer_reviews.author: MikeT89

customer_reviews.title: Works well in serious snow country!
customer_reviews.text: Living at Lake Tahoe, where I've gotten feet of snow, the Snow MOOver has been a big help in clearing snow from my Jeep Latitude. It's a lot more gentle on the vehicle than the previous brush I had, and it's got a great reach. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bleiweiss

customer_reviews.title: It's very good.
customer_reviews.text: After a very snowy Winter this snow mover was tested. It does just what I expected it to do. The extendable shaft works well as I sweep off snow from my Dodge Pickup truck. It removes snow well without scratching the paint also. It collapses to make itself smaller for storage. It's very good.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Cantelmo

customer_reviews.title: Is it possible to love a snow brush?
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is. This thing is great - it clears my car fast. I'm even able to remove the snow from the roof - something short me has never been able to do before. The ice scraper is a beast and the foam plow part lets you push or pull the snow easily. Tradition bristle brushes pack with snow instantly, making them ineffective and then all that snow melts inside your car. I'd give this 20 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Sporkles

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We had the opportunity to use this after a recent snowstorm. It was easier for me to reach the top of my vehicle with the telescoping handle. Hubby liked it so much he not only cleaned his car, but all of our neighbors cars, too.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: We live on a mountain pass and get tons of snow. Wish I'd found this 6 years ago. It makes clearing snow and ice easier. Without scratches.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best snow remover. Cuts snow cleaning time in half. Bought it for my husband for his birthday and it’s the gift that keeps on giving — since it’s so quick and easy to clean off SUVs, he does mine too in the same amount of time it would have taken to do his car with his old brush.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Just got the clear the car with this for the first time. It is AWESOME. before this I always had cheap drug store scrapers, and this blew them all away. Very well constructed and solid. Simple to adjust and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan w arras

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for short person clearing truck
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 ft tall & this was a HUGE help this winter. Easy to clear the hood & roof of my truck with it's long reach.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Best snow tool I've used. The scraper that comes with this tool is heavy duties, and the show removing part works really well
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper 1

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is the best snow remove I have ever had, purchased a larger vehicle and needed something to reach over the top, this works great. The top of the vehicle is a full moon roof and the material the scrapper is made of will not scratch the glass. wonderful purchase. The reach is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Ferrel

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Bought enough for family.
customer_reviews.text: Love this snow MOOver! Bought more for the rest of the family. It is very long and has a nice cushy handle, but also collapses and breaks down into a manageable size. Just what you need to fight old man winter on your own terms!
customer_reviews.author: OtakusChaosTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Expected better.
customer_reviews.text: The sponge is difficult to get the right angle to push the snow off along with having a plastic bubble cap in the middle that often causes issues. For the price it is better to just get a simple brush at wal mart. I found it more difficult brushing off my vehicle than it helped. Benefits: the long reach of the pole almost allow you to reach across the vehicle from one side. Seems sturdy so far with the connecting points.
customer_reviews.author: matthew dean gochis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was too big but it actually came so in handy on heavy snow days for my car. It extends really far and if your 5’2 like me you will be able to reach over your car to get all the snow off the top.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: This snow brush does its job very well
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived really quickly, but was damaged. The seller responded immediately and sent a replacement--just in time for the first sizable snow of the season. This snow brush is long, even without extension, but when extended, reaches all the way across the hood of my car. I was able to push a significant amount of heavy, wet snow without causing any scratches or damage to the paint. So far, so good. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: QQQQQQQ

customer_reviews.title: No customer service?
customer_reviews.text: Used this item 3 Times, during the 3rd time the small orange plastic piece near the foam pad that allows it to swivel snapped in half. Seems like it might just be that small part that needs to be replace, however tried contacting customer support for this with no reply. It’s defin a great product but should not break after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow
customer_reviews.text: If you are in an area with snow this is a must have, I am from Boston area and it's perfect. The law requires snow off car roofs and this gets it done with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Has a long extending arm that works easy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten any snow yet so I haven't really gotten a chance to use it yet but they won't stop bugging me to review it. Looks nice seems sturdy. Like the pivoting head and extending arm and it works easy when I played with it after putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: autotech18

customer_reviews.title: Makes snow clearing twice as fast.
customer_reviews.text: Makes snow clearing twice as fast. Extra 2 minutes of sleep! The ice scraper side is sturdy, aggressive and very effective. The soft edges of the snow pushing end will not damage your paint. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Previous model was better
customer_reviews.text: I have both the obe with a brush and the one with the orange flin, the brush works much better, the ideal product would be brush with orange flin on top, but they don't make it, until then, stay on the brush model (exendable)
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Good snow brush
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my truck, it pushes snow off and scrapes ice off my windshield. I can reach the top of my truck and push the snow off onto the other side, it works well! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This snow brush is the best one I have had so far. Good price and very high quality. The foam is a nice upgrade from typical brushes. With it being so long you can clear your car or truck without wearing the snow. I would recommend to anyone looking to upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Hoosierdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Durability concerns
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I very much like this tool, BUT the foam seems like it will wear out after only a couple years. That would be fine if not for the premium price tag...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Double tough!  Best snow rake for car hoods, roofs, and airplane wings too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the car windows and roof, we are having a big snow year here in Alaska, and it seemed like a good idea. The thing is way sturdy and tough, and to top it all off, when I forgot the large broom I generally use for sweeping the airplane wings, this handle is long enough and sturdy enough that I was able to clean off the wings of our bush plane and visit my folks for lunch on the homestead after all!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Osowski

customer_reviews.title: Snow-No-More with this Sturdy, Yet Lightweight Car Roof Rake!
customer_reviews.text: It won't break on you like the 1st one I bought at a local store. It's sturdy and retractable, for easy storage. Never worry about getting that snow off your car again! It's well worth the money! And coming from a hardy New Englander, that's saying something!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Worked great....until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I only used this scraper twice before the scraper end snapped off. I live in the northeast, and I've never had a scraper that's this expensive snap like this. I thought it was heavier-duty.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly what I wanted and works fine. My rating is due to the fact when ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I wanted and works fine. My rating is due to the fact when I opened the package and was figuring out how it functions the lock spring for the telescoping function popped out. I don't not like fixing brand new items. Luckily I got it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great scraper!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LEGIT I bought it thinking we would get our usual heavy snow this year. We did not. BUT on the days my windshield was frozen over, this thing rocked it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great snow brush and ice scraper, very big.
customer_reviews.text: Used this all last winter, just bought a second one for our other car. It’s simple to use, the reach is great for our SUV and Minivan. The scraper works great and the push brush clears snow quickly. This is for the “extendable deluxe” size (detachable ice scraper/foam push brush) The big downside is the size, it’s quite large and can’t be kept on the floor next to the drivers seat; you need to store in the hatch/trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Varkias

customer_reviews.title: Big Time Saver in the Snow
customer_reviews.text: This snow scraper is a new and improved design that is easy to open/extend and very good at reaching snow on top of the car without scratching. I got one for each of us and I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for taller SUVs and pickups
customer_reviews.text: A must have for taller, lifted trucks or SUVs. Easy to extend, solid feeling, will reach to opposite edge of windshield. Ice scraper performed well with minimal effort. No more standing on the running boards or rocker panels with doors open,
customer_reviews.author: Littlepup5

customer_reviews.title: Good for large vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Pros -Easy to use -Easy to extend handle and change angle -Good Grips -Squeegee like blade really works well Cons -This is huge. You cant fit it in a lot of places -It needs a brush for door handles
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a god send. I’ve got street parking and an SUV. Cleaning off the roof of my car was such a nightmare before. I keep the ice scraper disconnected in the car and leave the rest of the thing at home usually.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: cheap and will break beware
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart when i opened the box. The little spring and button on the end fell out. It was useable... until the whole push part snapped off after about 3 uses. Pos dnb
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: BIRDROCK HOME Snow MOOver 55"
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I haven't had it long enough to comment on durability but it seems well made. I don't use the small ice scraper, just the pusher part.
customer_reviews.author: DRrrrr

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn’t
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for one season and it worked great. I pulled it out for the first snowfall and was able to get half of my car cleaned off before it broke. The plastic head broke off. Definitely NOT “a ridiculously strong snow brush”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BIRDROCK HOME Snow MOOver 55" Extendable Foam Snow Brush and Ice Scraper with Soft Grip - Winter Tool - Auto Window Windshield Snow Brush - Car Ice Scraper - Truck SUV - Snow Removal
product_meta.description: Size:Deluxe ExtendableThe BirdRock Home Snow MOOver and Ice Scraper are built to help you conquer winter! Nobody likes waking up in the morning or coming out from work to see their car covered in a foot of snow, much less having to remove it. The Snow MOOver makes it easy to push off snow with the car friendly, freeze resistant foam head. Extend the foam head up to 55" to remove the hard to reach pockets of snow on your car, truck, suv or van. You can also extend the Snow MOOVer to avoid being covered in snow while clearing your car off. The Ice Scraper features jaws made out of extra thick plastic and a flat ice scraper. Use the jaws to break up ice, then use the scraper to the remove it. The Ice Scraper is removable from Snow MOOver. Safe to use on car wind shields and windows. Great for any suv, car, truck or van. Extend the Ice Scraper to remove the hard to reach ice in the middle of your wind shield. The Snow MOOVer and Ice Scraper have been battle tested in the Rocky Mountains to ensure they're up to the challenge of keeping your car free of snow and ice!
feature_bullets: DURABLE SNOW BRUSH WITH ROTATING HEAD: The snow brush easily removes snow and ice from car windshield, top and hood. Equipped with a rotating head allowing you to set the brush at the optimum angle for the job at hand
EXTENDABLE SNOW BRUSH: The snow brush scraper extends up to 55” making the hard-to-reach pockets of snow reachable.

REMOVABLE ICE SCRAPER: The Ice Scraper features an ice scraper and jaws. Use the jaws to break up the ice, then use the scraper to remove it. The ice scraper is removable for faster and easier use. The snow scraper comes with 3 separate units--Foam Head Snow Brush, Ice Scraper & Telescoping extender. Piece it all together when in use or separate it for easy storage when not in season
FOAM GRIP & LIGHTWEIGHT: The snow scraper is equipped with foam grips for a more delightful touch yet lightweight enough for easy mobility.
DIMENSIONS: Extended Dimensions: 14” Width x 2” Depth x 55” Height (35.6cm W x 5.1cm D x 99.1cm H) Dimensions: 14” W x 2” D x 31” H (35.6cm W x 5.1cm D x 78.7cm H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,774 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
